rosters.name: ACX
rosters.notes: Sign up to audition; Books distributed on Audible, Amazon, and iTunes; STRONGLY suggest ensuring that job posters have rights to audiobook; US, UK, Ireland, Canada-based talent ONLY

rosters.name: AhabTalent
rosters.notes: Sign up for audition matches to be emailed to you

rosters.name: DreamVoices
rosters.notes: Narration demo and/or commercial demo required; Looking to grow a diverse roster

rosters.name: Ear-Reality
rosters.notes: BASED IN GERMANY; Record their sample script and upload; Stories distributed on Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant and Samsung Bixby

rosters.name: Findaway Voices
rosters.notes: Sign up, create a profile, auditions will be sent to you based on profile and voice specifications

rosters.name: Graphic Audio
rosters.notes: Fill out the Google form, and the casting directors will review the submission within 1-2 months; 'Particular consideration will be given to animation and interactive demos that highlight acting and dialect work.'

rosters.name: Royal Guard Publishing
rosters.notes: See submission information under 'Narrator'; requests samples, website link, rates, and comfort level with adult content

rosters.name: GoVoices
rosters.notes: Fill out form and submit up to 3 demos. Requires information about home studio and/or local studio, and union status

rosters.name: Voice Crafters
rosters.notes: US AND UK TALENT NOT PERMITTED at this time; requires 5+ years of commercial experience

rosters.name: Voice Talent Online
rosters.notes: BASED IN THE UK; Fill out form and they will follow up requesting more info; Demos likely required

rosters.name: Voice Talent Warehouse
rosters.notes: Upload any demos you may have via their form; click 'Interested in Joining our Roster?'

rosters.name: VoiceProductions
rosters.notes: BASED IN BELGIUM; profile will need to be accepted in order to be provided with direct bookings (no auditions); asks for a variety of demos but requires at least three

rosters.name: Voquent
rosters.notes: Sign up to receive auditions based on profile and voice specifications. Optional paid features.

rosters.name: Casting Call Club - Discord
rosters.notes: Requires Discord. Great for indie projects! Server has a great community

rosters.name: DevTalk
rosters.notes: Discord required; Great for Visual Novel jams & passion projects; Doesn't require demo, but some devs will ask for them

rosters.name: Voice Acting Club (VAC) - Discord
rosters.notes: Requires Discord; Great for indie projects & welcoming community!

rosters.name: produb
rosters.notes: Requires app to be downloaded on your mobile device; Your application must be approved to submit to available jobs; Samples or demos required in order for your application to be approved

rosters.name: Online Voice Actor Affiliation
rosters.notes: Requires Facebook; FB group by Morgan Berry

rosters.name: Voice Acting Alliance
rosters.notes: Requires Facebook; FB group by Morgan Berry; great community!

rosters.name: Voice Acting Club (VAC) - Facebook
rosters.notes: Requires Facebook; FB group by Kira Buckland & VAC; great community!

rosters.name: No Studio in Particular
rosters.notes: Mailing list for No Studio in Particular; casting calls are posted to their social media, Discord, and sent to this mailing list

rosters.name: Very Berry Studios
rosters.notes: Mailing list for Very Berry Studios; casting calls are posted to their social media, Discord, and sent to this mailing list

rosters.name: Casting Call Club - Website
rosters.notes: Sign up and audition; Great for indie projects and newer voice actors; Paid subscription tiers available

rosters.name: Dragonuk Connects
rosters.notes: U.S. Mid-Atlantic Region focused, but permits other regions to be selected. Demos are optional but highly suggested. Very on-camera heavy. Paid membership required to use forum, have a public profile, send and receive messages, and receive 'Special Profile Castings'

rosters.name: Newgrounds - Forum
rosters.notes: Forum for opportunities; Great for indie projects and newer voice actors

rosters.name: Voice Acting Club (VAC)  - Forum
rosters.notes: Forum for opportunities; great community!

rosters.name: Actor's Access
rosters.notes: Subscription $68/yr; Demo encouraged but not required; Check breakdowns to see if a job is voiceover or other

rosters.name: Backstage
rosters.notes: Free to join; $16/mo (billed annually), $20/mo (billed bi-annually), $25/mo

rosters.name: Bodalgo
rosters.notes: BASED IN GERMANY; Accepts remote talent; 'Considers professionally trained actors only'; free to join; $245/yr premium

rosters.name: CastVoices
rosters.notes: Free to join; $15/mo & $25/mo options. Does not affect audition order, only amount of demos and media allowed.

rosters.name: VO Planet
rosters.notes: Requires subscription; $199/yr

rosters.name: Voice Over Market
rosters.notes: BASED IN THE UK; Requires subscription of €50/yr; Can book a studio for you in the UK if needed. Demos strongly suggested.

rosters.name: Voices123
rosters.notes: Subscription tiers from $299/yr to $2k+ per year; Audition for jobs you are invited to; Demos are not required but suggested

rosters.name: Lau Lapides/MCVO
rosters.notes: Requires commercial demo; freelance agency--will send auditions and represent if the job is booked; REQUIRES SOURCE CONNECT STANDARD

rosters.name: Amazing Voice
rosters.notes: Requires commercial demo; 'We are not a Voice Talent Directory; our roster is limited to a select number of top professionals in the voiceover industry'

rosters.name: Blend Voices (previously GM Voices)
rosters.notes: Submission form via the website. Requires RAW studio sample. They expect a few years of experience. OFFERS AI VOICE SERVICES TO THEIR CLIENTS BUT CLEARLY COMMUNICATES WITH TALENT WHICH JOBS WILL AND WILL NOT BE USED TO SYNTHESIZE AI VOICES.

rosters.name: Blue Wave
rosters.notes: Requires 'FULLY PRODUCED' POLITICAL demo; Not currently accepting talent but has a waitlist; see: website for how to submit

rosters.name: CAS Music
rosters.notes: Requires commercial demo; 'Your name should not be heard in the demo file.'

rosters.name: Casting by Smile
rosters.notes: BASED IN SWEDEN; Requires a resume; Send up to 3 demos via their submission form

rosters.name: Creative Media Design NYC
rosters.notes: Can upload multiple demos; requires SC-Standard, ipDTL, Phone Patch, or ISDN

rosters.name: Deyan Audio
rosters.notes: Demo requirement not indicated but suggested

rosters.name: Ear Works Media
rosters.notes: Requires commercial demo and Source Connect Standard OR Pro; Can record in-studio if located in the Virginia Beach, USA area; Requires quick turnarounds and open weekday availability

rosters.name: Encore Voices
rosters.notes: Submit through the account system on their website

rosters.name: Halp Network
rosters.notes: No demo required in submission, but should have a character demo on your website.

rosters.name: Holdcom
rosters.notes: Record their script to submit; Requires 24-hour turnaround fulfillment AND home studio; Scripts in English, Spanish, Italian, German, and French

rosters.name: IYUNO-SDI
rosters.notes: Requires character/animation demo; video game demos accepted as a supplement; Google Form Link is their 2022 submission form that was publicly shared

rosters.name: khōréō
rosters.notes: No experience or demo required; Requests confirmation that the applicant identifies as an immigrant/diaspora actor

rosters.name: Kocha Sound
rosters.notes: Requires character/animation demo; click 'submit here'; NO REPEAT SUBMISSIONS!

rosters.name: Lotas Productions
rosters.notes: To apply, navigate 'Voices' > 'Submit your demo'. SUBMISSION LINK HAS BEEN REMOVED AT THIS TIME

rosters.name: Network Nexus Studios
rosters.notes: To apply, navigate 'Careers' > 'Talent Pool Application Form'

rosters.name: ProComm Voices
rosters.notes: Requires commercial demo; REQUIRES SOURCE CONNECT STANDARD

rosters.name: Sound Cadence Studios
rosters.notes: Requires character/animation demo; click 'New Actor Submission Form'; DO NOT RESUBMIT SAME INFO!

rosters.name: Studio Center
rosters.notes: NOTE: EXCLUSIVE ROSTER. You are not allowed to be on any other rosters, P2P websites, or receive auditions from agents or managers. NOT CURRENTLY ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS

rosters.name: Studio Coattails
rosters.notes: Fill out google form. Requires character demo.

rosters.name: Studio Nano
rosters.notes: Requires character/animation demo

rosters.name: Studio Topaz / Tiger Mesa
rosters.notes: PREVIOUSLY EXTRA TERRIBLE; has a script for submission or demos can be submitted

rosters.name: TYDEF Studios
rosters.notes: Fill out form, submit up to 3 narration samples and headshot.

rosters.name: Voiceover Cafe
rosters.notes: BASED IN UK; Localization studio; Email demos and rates to hello@voiceover.cafe NOT CURRENTLY ACCEPTING US TALENT

rosters.name: VSI Group
rosters.notes: Demo not required, but highly suggested. Form asks for a sample of your work; click 'Freelancers'

rosters.name: Zoo Digital
rosters.notes: Requests demos, does not specify what kind

rosters.name: No Studio in Particular - Twitter
rosters.notes: Public casting calls sourced on behalf of clients, freelance service; has a community for voice actors

rosters.name: VA Casting Call RT
rosters.workType: Retweets paid casting calls on Twitter
rosters.notes: Turn on Tweet notifications to be pinged when a paid casting call is retweeted
